channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
I realize this isn't under the compiler related questions but that has only gained 1 view in 24 hours. Can anyone please help with my compiler error because I cannot get anything really done on my server before I get this problem solved. My error is: [code]Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue...[/code]
I am using SysCape V 3.0 source I think the error may have to do with my path or class path being messed up. Here is what is written in the compiler: [code]@echo off title Galkons Compiler cd source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code] My path is set to: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin[/code]

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

Lol this is hilarious how? You think its funny because you have spent your life getting familiar with computers and are very good with them. Some of us are just starting to get used to all the crazy things that are possible. You were exactly where we all were at one time or another. You can have you glory, but rubbing it in our face becauce we are not up to par with you quite yet is disrespectful. Seriously, learn some respect.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

Im confused now. I have a source. I have a client also. I have the source connected to the client and everything. I have the Ip address made from the website No-ip.com and I also have portforwarded it. So as far as I know everything is running correctly. The only problem that exists in my mind is how in the world will people find a client that is compatiable with my source and be able to get on. Im putting this server up for my friends and I. Where in the world will they go in order to get onto my server? Do I need a webclient? If so… how do I go about making one?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler

item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

I realize this isn’t under the compiler related questions but that has only gained 1 view in 24 hours. Can anyone please help with my compiler error because I cannot get anything really done on my server before I get this problem solved.
My error is:

Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue...

I am using SysCape V 3.0 source
I think the error may have to do with my path or class path being messed up.
Here is what is written in the compiler:

@echo off title Galkons Compiler cd source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
My path is set to:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin
